analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/5/0xbb13e608888e5d30c09b13f89d27631056161b9f.sol#152-154) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/5/0xbb13e608888e5d30c09b13f89d27631056161b9f.sol#254-293)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/5/0xbb13e608888e5d30c09b13f89d27631056161b9f.sol#378-401)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xbb13e608888e5d30c09b13f89d27631056161b9f.sol#476-491)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0xbb13e608888e5d30c09b13f89d27631056161b9f.sol#497-518)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/5/0xbb13e608888e5d30c09b13f89d27631056161b9f.sol#579-592) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/5/0xbb13e608888e5d30c09b13f89d27631056161b9f.sol#304-326):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(Controller(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/5/0xbb13e608888e5d30c09b13f89d27631056161b9f.sol#318-321)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/5/0xbb13e608888e5d30c09b13f89d27631056161b9f.sol#323-324)
SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/5/0xbb13e608888e5d30c09b13f89d27631056161b9f.sol#48-52) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/5/0xbb13e608888e5d30c09b13f89d27631056161b9f.sol#548-549) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/5/0xbb13e608888e5d30c09b13f89d27631056161b9f.sol#431-432)

MiniMeIrrevocableVestedToken.calculateVestedTokens.vestedTokens (local variable @ /unique_chucks/5/0xbb13e608888e5d30c09b13f89d27631056161b9f.sol#818-827) shadows:
	- MiniMeIrrevocableVestedToken.vestedTokens (function @ /unique_chucks/5/0xbb13e608888e5d30c09b13f89d27631056161b9f.sol#782-792)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/5/0xbb13e608888e5d30c09b13f89d27631056161b9f.sol#579-592)
	- /unique_chucks/5/0xbb13e608888e5d30c09b13f89d27631056161b9f.sol#586-591
